Author: SecretFinn
Text: In a checked bag it's perfectly fine! At least, I know digital scales are fine. If you have an old fashioned one with a needle just double check that it isn't pressure sensitive/doesn't have any hazardous materials

Author: ella0124
Text: i’ve flown with a scale in my carryon luggage, domestic. it didn’t even occur to me to check if that wasn’t allowed. i think it’s fine!
